page.title: 01DESCRIPT.EPPING GRN/NAZEING
page.content: WE FOUND OUT THAT FIGURES 2.57% OF LAND WAS COVERED BY NURSERIES AND GLASS HOUSES.10.25% WAS COVERED BY BUILDINGS AND FACTORIES.9.7% WAS TAKEN UP BY WOODLAND.2.2% WAS COVERED BY FARMHOUSES AND 11% WAS COMMON LAND.63% WAS AGRICULTURAL LAND.THIS MEANS THAT MOST OF THE LAND IN THE NAZEING,EPPING GREEN AREA WAS TAKEN UP BY AGRICULTURAL LAND.THERE WAS SUPRISINGLY NOT MANY FARM BUILDINGS.THIS SUGGESTS THAT MANY OF THE FARMS ARE MEDIUM TO LARGE.THE AREA IS FAIRLY SPARCELY POPULATED,THE MAIN CENTRES OF POPULATION BEING EPPING GREEN,NAZEING,BUMBLES AND PARTS OF BROADLY COMMON.
